pages.title: Thermal Container
pages.text: An insulated container that keeps hot food warm for extended periods. Any food placed inside will have its spoilage timer paused as long as the container remains intact.$(br2)Essential for stockpiling cooked food before temperatures make farming impossible. Craft one early and keep it stocked.$(br2)$(italic)Think of it as a lunchbox. A very important lunchbox. The most important lunchbox in the history of lunchboxes, because every other lunchbox is frozen solid on a dead planet.$()

Iron corners, leather sides, and a glass bottle center. The glass bottle acts as a vacuum seal. ORSA Engineering wanted to use a proprietary locking mechanism, but the budget went to Kevin's search-and-rescue fund.
